revised_title: Enhancing the Quantity of Electricity in Induction-Machines
tldr: The author explores methods to increase the quantity of electricity given by induction-machines, such as increasing the power of the exciting battery, using thicker or longer secondary helix wires, and combining helices collaterally. The study focuses on the magnetic induction and its effects on the electric induction, providing insights into the potential and resistance of induction machines.
